languages.text: {n}Жертва надсадно хрипит.{/n} "Это портной из нижнего города! Сошел с ума! Считает, что на мне лицо его брата, которого я перевел в камердинеры!"
{n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Жертва надсадно хрипит.{/n} "Это портной из нижнего города! Сошел с ума! Считает, что на мне лицо его брата, которого я перевел в камердинеры!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"
{n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"
{n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "I beg you, stop him! He's my tailor! He went mad with envy when I made his younger brother my valet..."
{n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

{n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

languages.text: {n}受害者喘着粗气，挣扎着开了口。{/n}“他是从下城区的裁缝！他疯了！他弟弟是我的贴身男仆，他以为我把他弟弟的脸剥下来了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}受害者喘着粗气，挣扎着开了口。{/n}“他是从下城区的裁缝！他疯了！他弟弟是我的贴身男仆，他以为我把他弟弟的脸剥下来了！”

languages.text: {n}被害者は苦しげに息を吸い込んだ。{/n}「あいつは下層区の仕立屋です！正気を失ってるんです！私が従者である彼の弟の顔を被ってると思い込んでるんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}被害者は苦しげに息を吸い込んだ。{/n}「あいつは下層区の仕立屋です！正気を失ってるんです！私が従者である彼の弟の顔を被ってると思い込んでるんです！」

languages.text: {n}La víctima logra reprimir un jadeo.{/n} «¡Es un sastre de la ciudad inferior! ¡Se ha vuelto loco! ¡Cree que llevo la cara de su hermano, mi ayudante de cámara!».
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La víctima logra reprimir un jadeo.{/n} «¡Es un sastre de la ciudad inferior! ¡Se ha vuelto loco! ¡Cree que llevo la cara de su hermano, mi ayudante de cámara!».

languages.text: {n}Kurban, korkudan nefes nefese konuşuyor.{/n} "Aşağı şehirden bir terzi! Delirmiş! Uşağım olan kardeşinin yüzünü aldığımı sanıyor!"
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kurban, korkudan nefes nefese konuşuyor.{/n} "Aşağı şehirden bir terzi! Delirmiş! Uşağım olan kardeşinin yüzünü aldığımı sanıyor!"

languages.text: {n}La victime inspire avec difficulté.{/n} « C'est un tailleur des bas quartiers ! Il est devenu fou ! Il est persuadé que je porte le visage de son frère, mon valet ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La victime inspire avec difficulté.{/n} « C'est un tailleur des bas quartiers ! Il est devenu fou ! Il est persuadé que je porte le visage de son frère, mon valet ! »

languages.text: {n}Das Opfer atmet rasselnd ein.{/n} "Er ist ein Schneider aus der unteren Stadt! Er hat den Verstand verloren! Er denkt, ich trage das Gesicht seines Bruders, meines Kammerdieners!"
languages.original_text: {n}The victim sucks in a ragged breath.{/n} "He's a tailor from the lower city! He's gone mad! He thinks I'm wearing the face of his brother, my valet!"
